chunk:
JD Glow Cosmetics Makeup Remover, Girl Bye! (2020 formulation)

Brand: JD Glow Cosmetics

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: Isododecane, Dimethicone, Aqua, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol
book: 1256-JD Glow Cosmetics Makeup Remover, Girl Bye! (2020 formulation)

chunk:
Ingredients: Isododecane, Dimethicone, Aqua, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol

Directions: Shake Well before use. Use only One Drop. Drop the product on a piece of tissue then wipe the area where you want to remove the makeup. Or you can use your hands.
book: 1256-JD Glow Cosmetics Makeup Remover, Girl Bye! (2020 formulation)

chunk:
Directions: Shake Well before use. Use only One Drop. Drop the product on a piece of tissue then wipe the area where you want to remove the makeup. Or you can use your hands.

Warnings: Disclaimer: Cosmetic Glitter is NOT FDA approved for use in or around the Eyes.
